Title: Soup of the day
Subtitle: Something new every day
P1: Our special soup is made fesh every day by our chef with a new recipie to give you something unique each day
P2: The soup may contain a variety of different flavours and tastes from day to day.
P3: The soup may contain various allergens that change daily, please check the warnings before ordering
Minor_note: Most versions of the soup are vegetarian, but not all are vegan
